description: This file defines the declaration of the LocalStore class, which implements the ILocalStore interface, managing local database operations such as opening databases, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entries, removing entries, and adding entries. It includes necessary headers, namespace organization, and member function declarations.

classes.name: LocalStore
classes.description: A class implementing local storage functionalities, including database operations such as opening, creating tables, setting entry limits, retrieving/adding/removing entries, using a database connection object and managing a file path.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens a database connection at the specified file path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the database.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in a specified table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries in a table within a specified range.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Fetches a list of entries from a table starting from a specified index.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries within a specified index range from a table.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a specified table.

methods.name: buildGetEventsQuery
methods.description: Constructs SQL query string to retrieve events from a table based on start index and count.
